name: Mad, Mad Mutant
description:
Made in 48 Hours for Butterscotch Shenanijam 2019

Arrow keys move, CTRL fires. Weapons will appear on the map for you to pick up.

Font is Long Shot by MattyDeCesare on dafont.com. Gun sfx are edits of sounds found on freesound.org

Jam Theme: Cursemas Eve

Jam Achievements: Mozart, Maverick
